title: This shitty  "let's give you dumbass teammates in your promos" matchmaking has to STOP
body:
I was in my Gold 2 promos with 1 guaranteed win in Ranked Flex, so all I had to do is get one additional win to secure my place in Gold 1. To hopefully be able to make my matches feel smoother & safer to climb up, I had to request my Plat 2 friend to help out. This should sound easy to accomplish, right? 

#NOPE.

https://imgur.com/VGQ9zCx

1st match of my promos, I secured myself Urgot top to be able to be the carry of the team, while my friend secured himself Kha'zix to help out. Instead of having a pleasant simple game, we ended up having triple dumbasses who does nothing but gets caught out & dies multiple time, as you can see in this picture. My friend(Kha'zix) honestly attempted to help them so many times, and apparently, it was a huge mistake as he got brought down by these 3 idiots Riot decided to match me with.


https://imgur.com/FDRZeRf

In the next & final promos, I secured myself Aatrox being the better & stronger carry to the team. So far, the game has went smoothly. My friend(again Kha'zix) managed to snag up a bunch of kills, we could've ended the game in a jiffy. But again, nope. Riot this time decided to give us a bunch of teammates who has no clue on what they're doing, or even knowing wtf their champion does. Our mid lane Cass was so behind at that time, and what's more retarded is that when we manages to secured Baron, **she decided to 1v5 the whole enemy team out of the blue**.  What's even more worse is that each of these dumbasses were Mastery 5/6/7...

-----

Dear Riot, I honestly don't believe at all when you said we were matched "according to our MMR". And according to these pictures right here, I call your bullshit. This has got to stop. Either give us proper teammates in our promos, or do us a favor & remove promos since your aim was to spit at our climb.
